attributes.action: remove himself and every Scottish MP from all matters relating to the division of UK Asset's and Debt's resulting from impending English independance from the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is clearly only a matter of time before England finally gains independance from the horrific tax burden otherwise known as Scotland. It is ridiculous for England's interests to be primarily represented by Scottish MP's who post-independance will benefit from Scotland receiving the expected favouritism in the division of the UK's assets-and debts.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
